text: Rędziny () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kamienna Góra, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. == Gallery == File:Rędziny (województwo dolnośląskie) (004).jpg|Bus stop shelter File:Rędziny (województwo dolnośląskie) (009).jpg|Houses File:Rędziny, Kopalnia dolomitu - fotopolska.eu (171132).jpg|Mine ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Rędziny, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
